com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.gles

Class FullFrameRect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.gles.FullFrameRect

  • public class FullFrameRect
extends Object
    This class essentially represents a viewport-sized sprite that will be rendered with a texture, usually from an external source like the camera or video decoder.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FullFrameRect(Texture2dProgram program)
      Prepares the object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeProgram(Texture2dProgram program)
      Changes the program.
      int createTextureObject()
      Creates a texture object suitable for use with drawFrame().
      void drawFrame(int textureId, float[] texMatrix)
      Draws a viewport-filling rect, texturing it with the specified texture object.
      Texture2dProgram getProgram()
      Returns the program currently in use.
      void release(boolean doEglCleanup)
      Releases resources.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FullFrameRect

        public FullFrameRect(Texture2dProgram program)
        Prepares the object.
        Parameters:
        program - The program to use. FullFrameRect takes ownership, and will release the program when no longer needed.

    • Method Detail

      • release

        public void release(boolean doEglCleanup)
        Releases resources.

        This must be called with the appropriate EGL context current (i.e. the one that was current when the constructor was called). If we're about to destroy the EGL context, there's no value in having the caller make it current just to do this cleanup, so you can pass a flag that will tell this function to skip any EGL-context-specific cleanup.

      • getProgram

        public Texture2dProgram getProgram()
        Returns the program currently in use.

      • changeProgram

        public void changeProgram(Texture2dProgram program)
        Changes the program. The previous program will be released.

        The appropriate EGL context must be current.

      • createTextureObject

        public int createTextureObject()
        Creates a texture object suitable for use with drawFrame().

      • drawFrame

        public void drawFrame(int textureId,
                      float[] texMatrix)
        Draws a viewport-filling rect, texturing it with the specified texture object.
